site_name: Mountview Academy Of Theatre Arts120 Peckham Hill StreetLondonSouthwark
description: Major variation to change opening hours to 8am to allow breakfast opening. There are no proposed changes to the permitted hours for the supply of alcohol or other licensable activities, vary condition 841 in annexe 2 of the premises licence to allow the use of the terrace until 23:30 in line with recently submitted planning applicationreference 20/AP/0402 (PP-08490787), addition of non-standard timings on New Years Eve to permit licensable activities until 2am and closing at 2.30am on New Years Day. The application does not propose any other changes to the premises licence.
